\item[AUROC] Area under the receiver operating characteristic curve.

\item[CO] Cardiac output.

\item[SV] Stroke volume.

\item[SV] Stroke volume.

\item[CI] Compatibility interval, e.g 95% CI [19.3; 25.2]. For Bayesian estimates, it is a *credible interval*; for frequentist estimates, it is a *confidence interval*. In both cases it represents the interval of parameter values compatible of the observed data.
